This widget must work with jserv docker image: odysz/jserv-album:treegrid.

Quick Start

  1. download volume assets here;
  2. use the sript, docker-start, to start docker container;
  3. cline front end source: @anclient/anreact 0.4.38 test/sessionless, run webpack
  4. eidt dist/private/host.json, point jserv to web service in docker container. See github.json for example.
  5. load this page with a web server, e.g. Python -m http.server 8888

See also AnTreeditor docfor quick start, and Example: doc type parser for customizing cells.

Asset Credit: 7. Common Sense? REBELLION: 1775-1776, America in Classic.
